mapper.select: SELECT DOC_SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, DRAFT_DATE, DEADLINE, FSETTLE_DATE, COLLABORATOR, SETTLEMENT, DOC_LOCATION FROM DOCSETTLE ORDER BY DOC_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCSETTLE (DOC_SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, DRAFT_DATE, DEADLINE, CONTENT, COLLABORATOR, SETTLEMENT) VALUES (DOCSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{draft_date}, #{deadline}, #{content}, #{collaborator}, #{settlement})
